# GET /v1/builds/{id}/relationships/preReleaseVersion | Apple Developer Documentation

- [ App Store Connect API ](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi)

- [ GET /v1/builds/{id}/relationships/preReleaseVersion ](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/get-v1-builds-_id_-relationships-prereleaseversion)

-  GET /v1/builds/{id}/relationships/preReleaseVersion 

Web Service Endpoint# GET /v1/builds/{id}/relationships/preReleaseVersion

App Store Connect API 3.6+## [URL](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/get-v1-builds-_id_-relationships-prereleaseversion#url)



```
GET https://api.appstoreconnect.apple.com/v1/builds/{id}/relationships/preReleaseVersion
```

## [Path Parameters](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/get-v1-builds-_id_-relationships-prereleaseversion#path-parameters)

`id``string` (Required) 

## [Response Codes](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/get-v1-builds-_id_-relationships-prereleaseversion#response-codes)

` 200 OK``[BuildPreReleaseVersionLinkageResponse`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/buildprereleaseversionlinkageresponse)`OK`

 Content-Type: application/json ` 400 Bad Request``[ErrorResponse`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/errorresponse)`Bad Request`

 Content-Type: application/json ` 401 Unauthorized``[ErrorResponse`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/errorresponse)`Unauthorized`

 Content-Type: application/json ` 403 Forbidden``[ErrorResponse`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/errorresponse)`Forbidden`

 Content-Type: application/json ` 404 Not Found``[ErrorResponse`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/errorresponse)`Not Found`

 Content-Type: application/json ` 429 ``[ErrorResponse`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/errorresponse)``

 Content-Type: application/json ## [See Also](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/get-v1-builds-_id_-relationships-prereleaseversion#see-also)

### [Getting Build Information](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/get-v1-builds-_id_-relationships-prereleaseversion#Getting-Build-Information)

[`List Builds`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/get-v1-builds)Find and list builds for all apps in App Store Connect.[`Read Build Information`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/get-v1-builds-_id_)Get information about a specific build.[`Read the App Information of a Build`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/get-v1-builds-_id_-app)Get the app information for a specific build.[`Read the app ID of a build`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/get-v1-builds-_id_-relationships-app)Get the app ID for a specific build.[`Read the App Store Version Information of a Build`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/get-v1-builds-_id_-appstoreversion)Get the App Store version of a specific build.[`GET /v1/builds/{id}/relationships/appStoreVersion`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/get-v1-builds-_id_-relationships-appstoreversion)[`Read the Prerelease Version of a Build`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/get-v1-builds-_id_-prereleaseversion)Get the prerelease version for a specific build.[`Read usage metrics for a beta build`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/get-v1-builds-_id_-metrics-betabuildusages)Get usage metrics for a specific build.
